metadata.title: CVE-2025-1244 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the Emacs text editor. Improper handling of custom"man" URI schemes allows attackers to execute arbitrary shell commands bytricking users into visiting a specially crafted website or an HTTP URLwith a redirect.

criterions.comment: xemacs21 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
xemacs21-packages package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
emacs24 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
